scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../ml-server && pip install -r requirements.txt

scripts.health: curl -f http://localhost:5000/api/health && curl -f http://localhost:8000/health && curl -f http://localhost:3000/ || echo 'Some services not responding'
